column5: The focus of this programme is the development of cross-cultural management skills in addition to providing a foundational understanding of how businesses operate. It is ideal for students seeking to pursue a range of managerial careers in either commercial or not-for-profit organisations, and it is suitable for graduates with a good first degree in any subject.
column7: Home (UK) full time - £11,400 Home (UK) part time - £5,700 Home (UK) sandwich (placement) - £2,000 International full time - £16,800 International sandwich (placement) - £2,000
column9: 1 or 2 years full time, 2 years part time
